languages.text: {n}Торбальд возвышает голос, чтобы перекричать братьев:{/n} "Взял ли ты в той битве славный трофей, как знак своей доблести?"
{n}Thorbald raises his voice to shout over his brothers:{/n} "Did you take a glorious trophy in that battle as a token of your valour?"
languages.original_text: {n}Торбальд возвышает голос, чтобы перекричать братьев:{/n} "Взял ли ты в той битве славный трофей, как знак своей доблести?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald raises his voice to shout over his brothers:{/n} "Did you take a glorious trophy in that battle as a token of your valour?"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Thorbald levanta la voz por encima de sus hermanos:{/n} «¿Has obtenido un trofeo glorioso como muestra de tu valor?».
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald raises his voice to shout over his brothers:{/n} "Did you take a glorious trophy in that battle as a token of your valour?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald levanta la voz por encima de sus hermanos:{/n} «¿Has obtenido un trofeo glorioso como muestra de tu valor?».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}索巴德提高了嗓门，向他的兄弟们大声喊道。{/n}“在那场战斗中，你有没有得到光荣的战利品，作为英勇的象征？”
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald raises his voice to shout over his brothers:{/n} "Did you take a glorious trophy in that battle as a token of your valour?"

traits.locale_text: {n}索巴德提高了嗓门，向他的兄弟们大声喊道。{/n}“在那场战斗中，你有没有得到光荣的战利品，作为英勇的象征？”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}トールバルドは声を張り上げて兄弟たちに向かって叫ぶ。{/n}「勇気の証としてあの戦場から栄光の戦利品を手に入れたか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald raises his voice to shout over his brothers:{/n} "Did you take a glorious trophy in that battle as a token of your valour?"

traits.locale_text: {n}トールバルドは声を張り上げて兄弟たちに向かって叫ぶ。{/n}「勇気の証としてあの戦場から栄光の戦利品を手に入れたか？」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Thorbald hausse le ton pour se faire entendre au milieu du vacarme ambiant :{/n} « Avez-vous récupéré quelque glorieux trophée attestant de votre bravoure lors de ce combat ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald raises his voice to shout over his brothers:{/n} "Did you take a glorious trophy in that battle as a token of your valour?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald hausse le ton pour se faire entendre au milieu du vacarme ambiant :{/n} « Avez-vous récupéré quelque glorieux trophée attestant de votre bravoure lors de ce combat ? »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Thorbald hebt die Stimme, um seine Brüder schreiend zu übertönen:{/n} "Habt Ihr in diesem Kampf eine glorreiche Trophäe als Zeichen Eurer Tapferkeit erobert?"
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald raises his voice to shout over his brothers:{/n} "Did you take a glorious trophy in that battle as a token of your valour?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald hebt die Stimme, um seine Brüder schreiend zu übertönen:{/n} "Habt Ihr in diesem Kampf eine glorreiche Trophäe als Zeichen Eurer Tapferkeit erobert?"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Thorbald, kardeşlerinin sesini bastırmak için bağırıyor.{/n} "Yiğitliğinin göstergesi olarak görkemli bir ganimet aldın mı?"
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald raises his voice to shout over his brothers:{/n} "Did you take a glorious trophy in that battle as a token of your valour?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald, kardeşlerinin sesini bastırmak için bağırıyor.{/n} "Yiğitliğinin göstergesi olarak o savaştan bir ganimet aldın mı?"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil
